title: 2013 picture from Bangladesh shared as BJP member assaulting elderly Muslim man
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
A photograph of a man assaulting an elderly man by pulling his beard in the presence of a policeman is viral on social media. As per the claims, a BJP member was assaulting a Muslim. One Shahfeeq Bhai had posted the image on Facebook in April this year with the caption “Ye police wala nahi BJP ka kutta hai. (translation: this is not a policeman but a BJP dog).” The picture is being shared with the text “3 din ka andaar ya haat jodta hua nazar ayenga agar acche sa viral hua toh agar musalman ho aur nabi ki sunnat sa pyaar krte ho to sabi groups ma share karo (Translation: In 3 days this man will be seen folding his hands if this goes viral. If you are a Muslim and love your prophet, share in all groups.)” The post has been shared over 10,000 times.

The picture has been circulating since 2018.

Recently, we have received requests to verify the image on the Alt News app, which suggests that the photograph has been doing rounds on WhatsApp as well.

A reverse image search on Google led Alt News to multiple blog posts carrying the same picture. A 2013 blog post on Insanity for Humanity had uploaded the image with the caption – “Torture on older Islamists by opposition thugs in presence of Police in Bangladesh, #Paltan #Dhaka [13 Feb, 13]”. The blog also had another image of the same incident.



Another article on the

Anarticle published in Bengali on somewhereinblog.neton February 14, 2013, gives details of the incident. It says that during a protest, Bangladesh Chhatra League supporters assaulted an elderly Muslim man in front of the police in the Motijheel area of Dhaka, Bangladesh. The article also says that the photo was published in various national newspapers in Bangladesh.

In conclusion, a 2013 picture from Bangladesh is viral on social media with the claim that it shows a BJP member assaulting an elderly Muslim man in India.
